attributes.action: reconsider the wrong decision to extradite Gary McKinnon to USA and to renegotiate the extradition treaty with USA to ensure equal treatment of US citizens sought in this country particularly where mental health issues arise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I regard the extradition of a man who has Aspergers' Disease quite unreasonable.   On the wider basis, I cannot understand why we have given to the USA powers which the USA would give to no other country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
